text: Klaas Bakker (22 April 1926 - 7 January 2016) was a Dutch footballer. He played as a midfielder and striker. He played for De Volewijckers between 1943 and 1951. He later played for Ajax until 1957. He was born in Amsterdam, North Holland. Bakker died on 7 January 2016 in Amstelveen, aged 89. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Footballers from Amsterdam
title: Klaas Bakker
